ddl:
CREATE TABLE dev_app(
  ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT 'ID' ,
  CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL  default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  COMMENT '创建时间' ,
  DISPLAY_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '显示名称' ,
  CODE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  COMMENT '编码' ,
  VERSION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  default '1.0.0'  COMMENT '版本号' ,
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(500)   COMMENT '说明' ,
  constraint uk_dev_app_code unique (CODE),
  constraint PK_dev_app primary key (ID)
)

CREATE TABLE dev_app_dict(
  ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT 'ID' ,
  APP_ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT '所属应用' ,
  NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '名称' ,
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(500)   COMMENT '说明' ,
  constraint UK_DEV_APP_DICT_APPID_NAME unique (APP_ID,NAME),
  constraint PK_dev_app_dict primary key (ID)
)

CREATE TABLE dev_app_domain(
  ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT 'ID' ,
  APP_ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT '所属应用' ,
  DISPLAY_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '显示名称' ,
  NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '编码' ,
  constraint uk_dev_app_domain_appid_name unique (APP_ID,NAME),
  constraint PK_dev_app_domain primary key (ID)
)
